body_html: libpath = '' is the case that will search in system dirs and LD_LIBRARY_PATH (that's what ctypes does). It might be the case that you have an older cuDNN version installed somewhere in the system, and it's the one getting picked up instead of the one we provide in the binaries.
body_text: libpath = '' is the case that will search in system dirs and LD_LIBRARY_PATH (that's what ctypes does). It might be the case that you have an older cuDNN version installed somewhere in the system, and it's the one getting picked up instead of the one we provide in the binaries.
body: `libpath = ''` is the case that will search in system dirs and `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` (that's what `ctypes` does). It might be the case that you have an older cuDNN version installed somewhere in the system, and it's the one getting picked up instead of the one we provide in the binaries.
